page.title: 14METAL INDUSTRIES,KNOTTINGLEY
page.content: RHP Bearings at Ferrybridge are the 5th largest makers of{engine bearings in UK.They send their products all over the world, even to Japan and China. Harkers{Shipyard}on the canal used to build barges and fishing boats,but now they can't compete on price, so they repair & refit boats,engines,shipping containers and anything else to keep out of the red!Part of the yard is now {small factory units}but many are empty as they have not been successful. Tranmers{Foundry}is one of many making {bottle moulds}, and parts for{power {stations}, and{coal}and{textile machinery.In an electric induction furnace,high frequency AC current changes polarity 1000 times a second in a thick copper wire coil around the crucible full of{iron},which heats up like food in a microwave oven.
